pages.title: Shibuichi Alloy
pages.text: Shibuichi Alloy is a dark alloy made of Copper and Silver. Shibuichi means "one-fourth" and indicates the alloy composition: one part Silver to three parts Copper.$(br)An alternative to Diamond, Shibuichi Alloy tools and armor are significantly less durable than their counterpart, but keeping the same speed and enchantability.
Raw Shibuichi Alloy can only be crafted and is not naturally obtainable.
